name: Run, Brush, Run!
description:
How the Story Ends: 

Goobert keeps on running and running, but everything just feels like it repeats itself. Goobert is about to give up when they feel a light touch on their shoulder. A soft voice starts to ring in their ears asking them to wake. Goobert starts to will themself awake, and then, their vision goes black. Goobert slowly begins to see bits of color blink into existence, until a full picture is formed. Goobert’s wife thanks them for waking and asks them to come eat dinner. Everything was just a dream. Gooberts smiles, glad their wife woke them from their nightmare, and walks towards the kitchen to eat a lovely meal with the love of their life, never having to run endlessly again. 

Title: Run, Brush, Run!

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview:

A brush person named Goobert goes to sleep in their world, but when they wake up they are in a completely different and strange place! All they want to do is get back to their wife and home. Their heart says the only way to get home is to run. So they take off across this new world.

Instructions:

Press the enter key to advance through the first set of text. From there,  press an arrow to start the game. Use the up arrow to jump, and the left and right keys to move their respective directions. If you fall, use enter to restart the game. Aim to get a high score!

Game Design Team

Zane Webb – Game Designer
